mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(area_id) FROM t_area WHERE `status` =#{type} AND area_name like CONCAT(#{areaName}, "%")
mapper.update: UPDATE t_area ta SET ta.`status` = 0 WHERE ta.area_id =#{areaId}
mapper.select: SELECT tc.camera_code, ta.area_name FROM t_camera tc LEFT JOIN t_site ts ON tc.site_id = ts.site_id LEFT JOIN t_area ta ON ts.area_id = ta.area_id
